channel.title: Use #GBGCommunity to connect GBG Chapters
channel.description:
For years, GBG chapters have yearned to be able to update each other on Chapter News, needs etc.
GBG Connect is awesome! So we are doing more....on TWITTER
Simply use **#GBGCommunity** for all your tweets about new questions, new problems. new successes, new vids and pics, new media, new opportunities, new get-togethers, new funding stuff, new research opportunities and new Chapter hellos and shout outs!
#GBGCommunity is a perfect, simple and quick way to blast out a link to a source for more on that topic!!
Post on GBG Connect then blast a link out on #GBGCommunity to send folks back here!
Cant wait to catchup quickly via Twitter and continue our take over of the world for mobility!
